name: Yarn over
instructions: Pass yarn over the right needle.

name: Knit two together
instructions: With yarn at back, enter your right needle into the first two stitches in your left needle, from left to right, and knit both at the same time.

name: Purl two together
instructions: With yarn at front, enter your right needle into the first two stitches in your left needle, from right to left, and purl both at the same time.

name: Slip, slip, knit
instructions: Slip the first stich onto the right needle. Knit the second stitch, then pass the first stich over the generated loop.

name: Cast on
instructions: Make a slip knot. Slide slip knot onto needle. Pull yarn to tighten knot. Wrap the working yarn around your thumb so you have a loop around your thumb. Bring the needle under and up through the loop around your thumb. Remove your thumb from the loop and pull the yarn.

name: Bind off
instructions: Insert the tip of the left needle into the front of the right-hand st on the right needle. Lift up and over the left-hand st. Allow st on the left needle to drop off the needle, leaving just one stitch on the right needle.

name: Make one stitch
instructions: Pull up a loop from knitted fabric. K1.

name: Drop one stitch
instructions: Take st off needle and unravel it until the beginning of the project.

name: Make bobble
instructions: Knit into desired st without dropping the loop off the left needle. Knit same st through back loop, then through front loop.

name: Cross 3 stitches backwards
instructions: Slip next 2 sts onto cable needle and leave at back of work, K1, then K2 from cable needle.

name: Cross 3 stitches forward
instructions: Slip next st onto cable needle and leave at front of work, K2, then K1 from cable needle.

name: Cross 4 stitches left
instructions: Slip next 2 sts onto cable needle and leave at front of work, P2, then K2 from cable needle.

name: Cross 4 stitches right
instructions: Slip next 2 sts onto cable needle and leave at back of work, K2, then P2 from cable needle.

name: Decrease 4
instructions: Slip next 3 sts with yarn at back (WS) of work, *lift second st on right needle over first (centre) st and off right needle, slip centre st back onto left needle, lift second st on left needle over centre st*, slip centre st back onto right needle, rep from * to * once more (4 sts decreased), K centre st.

name: Twist two stitches left
instructions: K into back of second st on left needle then K tog through back loop first and second sts and slip both sts off left needle at same time.

name: Twist two stitches right
instructions: K2tog leaving sts on left needle, K first st again and slip both sts off left needle at same time.
